title: Young Murasaki (Waka Murasaki), Calligraphic Excerpt from Chapter 5 of the "Tale of Genji" (Genji monogatari)
description:
Transliteration: Ohi tatamu / ari ka mo shiranu / wakakusa o / wokurasu tsuyu zo / kiemu sora naki.
Translation:  When no one can say where it is the little plant will grow up at last, the dewdrop soon to leave her does not see how she can go.
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Bequest of the Hofer Collection of the Arts of Asia
medium: The fifth of a series of 54 kotobagaki (calligraphic album leaves) mounted in an album with illustrations; ink and color on paper

images.publiccaption: Chapter 5: A is painting on left, B is calligraphy on right
images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
